text: Hi <@U01L6S710JD> pls check my resume I’m perfect person for your requirement

Hello! Thank you for your message and happy holidays to you as well! We at Makeitfuture are excited to hear about your new Saigon Digital agency website relaunch. We are an automation company specializing in building and implementing automation solutions for businesses. We also have experience working with the HubSpot CMS and Jamstack based web development projects. It sounds like there may be potential for us to collaborate and see how we can support each other’s businesses. Please feel free to reach out to us at <http://www.makeitfuture.com|www.makeitfuture.com> or through our contact page to discuss further. We look forward to connecting with you.
